purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 轿)
Ideographic: A lofty 喬 carriage 車; 喬 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
轎車 [ jiào chē ]: enclosed carriage for carrying passengers; motor carriage; car or bus; limousine; Classifiers: 部
轎夫 [ jiào fū ]: porter for a palanquin
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
    • 喬 [ qiáo ] tall, lofty; proud, stately
heisig_chinese_memo: The angel car takes you to heaven and has sedan chairs.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I made a cart out of my sedan chair so I could run anround and gather up all of the fallen angels.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " car " and " Qiao ", the original meaning is a means of transportation used in ancient times. "Jade Pian‧ Chabu": "Sedan, a small car." "Han Shu-Yan Zhu Zhuan": "Today, soldiers travel thousands of miles, with clothing and food. Travel hundreds of thousands of miles."

" Sedan chair " also means sedan chair and shoulders. Song Sima Guang's "Stories of Sushui" Volume 15: "Try to go to Laozi Temple and take a small sedan chair across Tianjin Bridge."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " car " and " Qiao ", the original meaning is a means of transportation used in ancient times.
humanum_full_description:
從「車」，「喬」聲，本義為古代過山用的交通工具。《玉篇‧車部》：「轎，小車。」《漢書‧嚴助傳》：「今發兵行數千里，資衣糧，入越地，輿轎而隃領，拖舟而入水，行數百千里。」

　　「轎」也表示轎子、肩輿。宋司馬光《涑水記聞》卷十五：「嘗欲往老子祠，乘小轎過天津橋。」
humanum_short_description: 從「車」，「喬」聲，本義為古代過山用的交通工具。

Freq: 6836
Chinese: The angel car takes you to heaven and has sedan chairs.
Meaning: sedan chair
Hanzi: 轿
Story: I made a cart out of my sedan chair so I could run anround and gather up all of the fallen angels.
Kind: traditional
從「 車 」，「 喬 」聲，本義為古代過山用的交通工具。《玉篇‧車部》：「轎，小車。」《漢書‧嚴助傳》：「今發兵行數千里，資衣糧，入越地，輿轎而隃領，拖舟而入水，行數百千里。」 「 轎 」也表示轎子、肩輿。宋司馬光《涑水記聞》卷十五：「嘗欲往老子祠，乘小轎過天津橋。」
From the sound of " car" and " Qiao", the original meaning is a means of transportation used in ancient times. "Jade Pian‧ Chabu": "Sedan, a small car." "Han Shu-Yan Zhu Zhuan": "Today, soldiers travel thousands of miles, with clothing and food. Travel hundreds of thousands of miles." " Sedan chair" also means sedan chair and shoulders. Song Sima Guang's "Stories of Sushui" Volume 15: "Try to go to Laozi Temple and take a small sedan chair across Tianjin Bridge."

轎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiào］
［《廣韻》渠廟切，去笑，羣。］
［《廣韻》巨嬌切，平宵，羣。］
“轿1”的繁体字。
(1)古代过山用的交通工具。
(2)肩舆。轿子。

轎字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轎； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1248第31
【廣韻】巨嬌切【集韻】【韻會】渠嬌切【正韻】祁堯切，?音橋。【玉篇】小車也。【韻會】竹輿也。【前漢·嚴助傳】輿轎而隃嶺。【註】隘路車也。今竹輿。　又與橋通。【史記·河渠書】山行卽橋。【正字通】卽轎也。蓋今之肩輿，謂其平如橋也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?渠廟切，音嶠。【廣韻】?車也。【韻會】?也。
